Pinyin1: jǐnguǎn lǎobǎn zuìjìn bù zài ， wǒmen háishi bùnéng tōulǎn 。
Chinese1: 尽管老板最近不在，我们还是不能偷懒。
Translate1: Although the boss is away recently, we still can't be lazy.

Pinyin1: jǐnguǎn wǒ hěn shēngqì ， dànshì wǒ méi fāpíqì 。
Chinese1: 尽管我很生气，但是我没发脾气。
Translate1: Although I was angry, I didn't lose my temper.

Pinyin1: jǐnguǎn tā de shū hěn yǒu zhēngyì ， dàn tā háishi chūbǎn le 。
Chinese1: 尽管他的书很有争议，但它还是出版了。
Translate1: Although his book was controversial, it was published.

Pinyin1: jǐnguǎn kùnnán hěnduō ， dànshì wǒmen bùnéng fàngqì 。
Chinese1: 尽管困难很多，但是我们不能放弃。
Translate1: Although there are many difficulties, we cannot give up.

Pinyin1: jǐnguǎn hěnduō rén pīpíng tā ， tā háishi jiānchí zhème zuò 。
Chinese1: 尽管很多人批评他，他还是坚持这么做。
Translate1: Although many people criticized him, he insisted on doing so.

Pinyin1: tā bùshì hěn nǔlì ， chéngjì dào  yě bùcuò 。
Chinese1: 他不是很努力，成绩倒也不错。
Translate1: He didn't work very hard, but his grades were not bad.

Pinyin1: yǐjīng shì chūntiān le ， dào yòu lěng qǐlai le 。
Chinese1: 已经是春天了，倒又冷起来了。
Translate1: It's already spring, but it's getting cold again.

Pinyin1: bù chīyào ， bìngdào mànmàn hǎo le 。
Chinese1: 不吃药，病倒慢慢好了。
Translate1: Without taking medicine, the illness gradually recovered.

Pinyin1: yīngyǔ bùshì tā de mǔyǔ ， tā shuō dé dào tǐng dìdao de 。
Chinese1: 英语不是他的母语，他说得倒挺地道的。
Translate1: English is not his mother tongue, but he speaks it quite well.

Pinyin1: zhè piānwénzhāng de nèiróng dào bùcuò ， jiùshì tàicháng le 。
Chinese1: 这篇文章的内容倒不错，就是太长了。
Translate1: The content of this article is good, but it is too long.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn yīfú de yàngshì hé dàxiǎo dào dōu héshì ， kěshì wǒ bù xǐhuan zhège yánsè 。
Chinese1: 这件衣服的样式和大小倒都合适，可是我不喜欢这个颜色。
Translate1: The shape and size of the dress are all right, but I don't like the color.

Pinyin1: wǒ shì nǐ zuìhǎo de péngyou ， nǐ què méi yāoqǐng wǒ 。
Chinese1: 我是你最好的朋友，你却没邀请我。
Translate1: I'm your best friend and you didn't invite me.

Pinyin1: wǒ shì nǐ zuìhǎo de péngyou ， dànshì nǐ què méi yāoqǐng wǒ 。
Chinese1: 我是你最好的朋友，但是你却没邀请我。
Translate1: I'm your best friend, but you didn't invite me.

Pinyin1: tājiā hěn yǒuqián ， tā què cóngláibù xuànyào 。
Chinese1: 他家很有钱，他却从来不炫耀。
Translate1: His family is rich, but he never shows it off.

Pinyin1: tājiā hěn yǒuqián ， dànshì tā què cóngláibù xuànyào 。
Chinese1: 他家很有钱，但是他却从来不炫耀。
Translate1: His family is rich, but he never shows it off.

Pinyin1: tā shì lǎobǎn ， què méiyǒu rén tīng tā de 。
Chinese1: 他是老板，却没有人听他的。
Translate1: He is the boss, but no one listens to him.

Pinyin1: tā de xuélì hěn gāo ， nénglì què hěn yībān 。
Chinese1: 他的学历很高，能力却很一般。
Translate1: He has a high degree of education, but his ability is very average.

Pinyin1: tāmen yījiànzhōngqíng ， què méiyǒu zài yīqǐ 。
Chinese1: 他们一见钟情，却没有在一起。
Translate1: They fell in love at first sight, but they were not together.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn yīfú suīrán shì míngpái ， dànshì zhìliàng què bùzěnmeyàng 。
Chinese1: 这件衣服虽然是名牌，但是质量却不怎么样。
Translate1: Although this dress is a famous brand, the quality is not very good.

Pinyin1: yǒuxiē rén zhìshāng hěn gāo ， qíngshāng què hěn dī 。
Chinese1: 有些人智商很高，情商却很低。
Translate1: Some people have a high IQ but a low EQ.

Pinyin1: yóuyú yìjiàn bù yīzhì ， liǎngwèi lǎobǎn chǎo le qǐlai 。
Chinese1: 由于意见不一致，两位老板吵了起来。
Translate1: Due to disagreement, the two bosses quarreled.

Pinyin1: yóuyú gōngsī fāzhǎn de xūyào ， wǒmen dǎsuàn zài zhāopìn yīxiē xīn de lǎoshī 。
Chinese1: 由于公司发展的需要，我们打算再招聘一些新的老师。
Translate1: Due to the needs of the company's development, we plan to recruit some new teachers.

Pinyin1: yóuyú mùbiāo kèhù de biànhuà ， qǐyè de yíngxiāo cèlüè xūyào zuòchū yīxiē tiáozhěng 。
Chinese1: 由于目标客户的变化，企业的营销策略需要做出一些调整。
Translate1: Due to changes in target customers, the company's marketing strategy needs to make some adjustments.

Pinyin1: yóuyú rénkǒu de kuàisù zēngjiā ， dàchéngshì de shèhuì wèntí yuèláiyuè yánzhòng 。
Chinese1: 由于人口的快速增加，大城市的社会问题越来越严重。
Translate1: Due to the rapid increase of population, social problems in big cities are becoming more and more serious.

Pinyin1: nǐ jìrán bùxiǎng shuō ， nà jiù biéshuō le 。
Chinese1: 你既然不想说，那就别说了。
Translate1: Since you don't want to say it, then don't say it.

Pinyin1: jìrán nǐ nàme xǐhuan ， nà jiù mǎi bā 。
Chinese1: 既然你那么喜欢，那就买吧。
Translate1: If you like it so much, buy it.

Pinyin1: tā jìrán gānggang fēnshǒu ， nà xiànzài yīnggāi shì dānshēn bā 。
Chinese1: 她既然刚刚分手，那现在应该是单身吧。
Translate1: Since she just broke up, she should be single now.

Pinyin1: jìrán nǐmen shì hǎo péngyou ， nà tā kěndìng huì bāng nǐ bā 。
Chinese1: 既然你们是好朋友，那他肯定会帮你吧。
Translate1: Since you are good friends, he will definitely help you.

Pinyin1: jìrán dàjiā dū bùgǎnxīngqù ， jiù huàngè huàtí bā 。
Chinese1: 既然大家都不感兴趣，就换个话题吧。
Translate1: Since no one is interested, let's change the subject.

Pinyin1: jìrán nǐ yǐjīng juédìng le ， wèishénme xiànzài hòuhuǐ ？
Chinese1: 既然你已经决定了，为什么现在后悔？
Translate1: Since you have already decided, why regret it now?

Pinyin1: nǐ de tóufa wén qǐlai hěnxiāng 。
Chinese1: 你的头发闻起来很香。
Translate1: Your hair smells so good.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn shìqing tīng qǐlai yǒudiǎn fùzá 。
Chinese1: 这件事情听起来有点复杂。
Translate1: This thing sounds a bit complicated.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē càicháng qǐlai dōu bùcuò 。
Chinese1: 这些菜尝起来都不错。
Translate1: These dishes all tasted good.

Pinyin1: nǐ de chuáng mō qǐlai hěn shūfu 。
Chinese1: 你的床摸起来很舒服。
Translate1: Your bed is comfortable to the touch.

Pinyin1: nǐ méi dàiyǎnjìng ， kàn dé qīngchu ma ？
Chinese1: 你没戴眼镜，看得清楚吗？
Translate1: You don't wear glasses, can you see clearly?

Pinyin1: tā zhème cūxīn ， zuòdéhǎo ma ？
Chinese1: 他这么粗心，做得好吗？
Translate1: He is so careless, is he doing well?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhème cōngming ， kěndìng xuédéhuì 。
Chinese1: 你这么聪明，肯定学得会。
Translate1: You are so smart, you must be able to learn.

Pinyin1: zǎoshang wǔdiǎn chūfā ， háizi men qǐ délái ma ？
Chinese1: 早上五点出发，孩子们起得来吗？
Translate1: Departure at five in the morning, can the kids get up?

Pinyin1: zhème gāo de shān ， nǐ pá dé shàngqu ma ？
Chinese1: 这么高的山，你爬得上去吗？
Translate1: Can you climb such a high mountain?

Pinyin1: nǐ de shēngyīn tàixiǎo le ， wǒmen tīngbujiàn 。
Chinese1: 你的声音太小了，我们听不见。
Translate1: Your voice is too low for us to hear you.

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ tàiàn le ， wǒ kànbùqīngchǔ 。
Chinese1: 这里太暗了，我看不清楚。
Translate1: It's too dark in here, I can't see clearly.

Pinyin1: zhège zìxíngchē tàipò le ， shéi dōu xiū bùhǎo 。
Chinese1: 这个自行车太破了，谁都修不好。
Translate1: This bike is so broken that no one can fix it.

Pinyin1: tā de tuǐ shòushāng le ， zhànbùqǐlái le 。
Chinese1: 她的腿受伤了，站不起来了。
Translate1: Her leg was hurt and she couldn't stand up.

Pinyin1: bāo tàixiǎo le ， shǒujī fàng bù jìnqù 。
Chinese1: 包太小了，手机放不进去。
Translate1: The bag is too small to fit the phone.

Pinyin1: nǐ tīngdedǒng shànghǎi huà ma ？
Chinese1: 你听得懂上海话吗？
Translate1: Can you understand Shanghainese?

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ zhēnde xǐhuan ， wǒ jiù gěi nǐ mǎi 。
Chinese1: 只要你真的喜欢，我就给你买。
Translate1: As long as you really like it, I will buy it for you.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ nǔlìxuéxí ， jiù huì yǒu jìnbù 。
Chinese1: 只要你努力学习，就会有进步。
Translate1: As long as you study hard, you will make progress.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào yǒu nǐ zài ， wǒ jiù fàngxīn le 。
Chinese1: 只要有你在，我就放心了。
Translate1: As long as you're here, I'm at ease.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào xiàyǔ ， tā jiù huì xīnqíng bùhǎo 。
Chinese1: 只要下雨，她就会心情不好。
Translate1: As long as it rains, she will be in a bad mood.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào kàndào māma ， bǎobǎo jiù bù kū le 。
Chinese1: 只要看到妈妈，宝宝就不哭了。
Translate1: As long as it sees its mother, the baby stops crying.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ wánchéng le gōngzuò ， jiù kěyǐ bùyòng jiābān 。
Chinese1: 只要你完成了工作，就可以不用加班。
Translate1: As long as you get the job done, you don't have to work overtime.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ māma tóngyì nǐ qù běijīng ， wǒ jiù méiyǒu yìjiàn 。
Chinese1: 只要你妈妈同意你去北京，我就没有意见。
Translate1: As long as your mother agrees with you to go to Beijing, I have no problem.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào bùdǔchē ， wǒmen jiù néng zhǔnshí dào 。
Chinese1: 只要不堵车，我们就能准时到。
Translate1: As long as there is no traffic jam, we can arrive on time.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ bù shēngqì ， wǒ jiù gàosu nǐ 。
Chinese1: 只要你不生气，我就告诉你。
Translate1: As long as you are not angry, I will tell you.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ de yāoqiú shì hélǐ de ， wǒmen jiù kěyǐ kǎolǜ 。
Chinese1: 只要你的要求是合理的，我们就可以考虑。
Translate1: As long as your request is reasonable, we can consider it.

Pinyin1: wǒ bù qù ， chúfēi nǐ yě qù 。
Chinese1: 我不去，除非你也去。
Translate1: I won't go unless you go too.

Pinyin1: nǐ bùnéng jìn ， chúfēi nǐ yǒu yùyuē 。
Chinese1: 你不能进，除非你有预约。
Translate1: You can't come in unless you have an appointment.

Pinyin1: wǒ bù shuō ， chúfēi nǐ dāying wǒ nǐ bùhuì shēngqì 。
Chinese1: 我不说，除非你答应我你不会生气。
Translate1: I won't tell unless you promise me you won't be angry.

Pinyin1: nǐ bùhuì zhème kuài shēngzhí ， chúfēi nǐ biǎoxiàn hěn hǎo 。
Chinese1: 你不会这么快升职，除非你表现很好。
Translate1: You won't be promoted so quickly unless you perform well.

Pinyin1: wǒmen gōngsī yībān bù yǔnxǔ yuángōng qǐngjià ， chúfēi lǐyóu hěn chōngfèn 。
Chinese1: 我们公司一般不允许员工请假，除非理由很充分。
Translate1: Our company generally does not allow employees to take leave unless there is a good reason.

Pinyin1: nǐ yě qù ， yàobùrán wǒ bù qù 。
Chinese1: 你也去，要不然我不去。
Translate1: You go too, or I won't go.

Pinyin1: mǎshàng bāng wǒ jiào chē ， yàobùrán wǒ gǎnbùshàng fēijī 。
Chinese1: 马上帮我叫车，要不然我赶不上飞机。
Translate1: Call me a car right away, or I won't be able to catch the plane.

Pinyin1: lǎoshī ， nín yào gěi wǒmen yīdiǎn tíshì ， yàobùrán shéi dōu xiǎngbùchū dáàn 。
Chinese1: 老师，您要给我们一点提示，要不然谁都想不出答案。
Translate1: Teacher, you have to give us a little hint, otherwise no one can come up with the answer.

Pinyin1: chúfēi nǐ shì huìyuán ， fǒuzé bùnéng jìnqù 。
Chinese1: 除非你是会员，否则不能进去。
Translate1: You can't get in unless you're a member.

Pinyin1: chúfēi yǒu qíjì ， bùrán tā de bìng zhìbùhǎo 。
Chinese1: 除非有奇迹，不然他的病治不好。
Translate1: Unless there is a miracle, his disease will not be cured.

Pinyin1: chúfēi nǐ tīng wǒ de ， fǒuzé wǒ bùhuì bāng nǐ 。
Chinese1: 除非你听我的，否则我不会帮你。
Translate1: I won't help you unless you listen to me.

Pinyin1: chúfēi nǐ yǒu zhèngjù ， bùrán shéi huì xiāngxìn ？
Chinese1: 除非你有证据，不然谁会相信？
Translate1: Who will believe it unless you have proof?

Pinyin1: chúfēi nǐ shì míngpáidàxué bìyè de ， fǒuzé lǎobǎn bùhuì kǎolǜ nǐ de 。
Chinese1: 除非你是名牌大学毕业的，否则老板不会考虑你的。
Translate1: Unless you graduated from a prestigious university, the boss will not consider you.

Pinyin1: chúfēi nǐmen mǎi hěnduō ， cáinéng piányi diǎn 。
Chinese1: 除非你们买很多，才能便宜点。
Translate1: Unless you buy a lot, it can be cheaper.

Pinyin1: chúfēi jiù de huài le ， wǒ cái huì mǎi xīn de 。
Chinese1: 除非旧的坏了，我才会买新的。
Translate1: I will buy a new one unless the old one breaks.

Pinyin1: chúfēi lǎobǎn gěi wǒ jiāxīn ， wǒ cái huì liúxiàlái 。
Chinese1: 除非老板给我加薪，我才会留下来。
Translate1: I will stay unless my boss gives me a raise.

Pinyin1: wǒmen wéi mèngxiǎng ér fèndòu 。
Chinese1: 我们为梦想而奋斗。
Translate1: We fight for our dreams.

Pinyin1: wéi wǒmen de jiànkāng ér duō zuò duànliàn 。
Chinese1: 为我们的健康而多做锻炼。
Translate1: Do more exercise for our health.

Pinyin1: nǐ shì wéi qián ér gōngzuò ma ？
Chinese1: 你是为钱而工作吗？
Translate1: Are you working for money?

Pinyin1: wǒ shì wéi péngyou ér zuò de zhèjiàn shìqing 。
Chinese1: 我是为朋友而做的这件事情。
Translate1: I did this for a friend.

Pinyin1: tā wèile néng qù rìběn ér kǔxué rìyǔ 。
Chinese1: 他为了能去日本而苦学日语。
Translate1: He studied Japanese hard in order to go to Japan.

Pinyin1: zhè bùjǐnjǐn shì wéi yúlè ér xiūjiàn de gōngyuán 。
Chinese1: 这不仅仅是为娱乐而修建的公园。
Translate1: This is not just a park built for fun.

Pinyin1: tā zuò shìqing jìkuài yòu hǎo 。
Chinese1: 他做事情既快又好。
Translate1: He does things quickly and well.

Pinyin1: xiāngduìláishuō ， wǒ gēng zhīchí wǒ de lǎobǎn 。
Chinese1: 相对来说，我更支持我的老板。
Translate1: Relatively speaking, I support my boss more.

Pinyin1: yángéláishuō ， tā shì wǒ fùzérén ， bùshì wǒ lǎobǎn 。
Chinese1: 严格来说，他是我负责人，不是我老板。
Translate1: Strictly speaking, he is my manager, not my boss.

Pinyin1: yángéláishuō ， tā shì huáyì ， bùshì zhōngguó rén 。
Chinese1: 严格来说，他是华裔，不是中国人。
Translate1: Strictly speaking, he is of Chinese descent, not Chinese.

Pinyin1: jùtǐláishuō ， zhèyàng zuò yǒu sānge hǎochu 。
Chinese1: 具体来说，这样做有三个好处。
Translate1: Specifically, there are three benefits to doing so.

Pinyin1: gōngzuò máng shì máng ， dànshì wǒ hěn kāixīn 。
Chinese1: 工作忙是忙，但是我很开心。
Translate1: I am busy at work, but I am very happy.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn yīfú hǎokàn shì hǎokàn ， dànshì bù shìhé wǒ 。
Chinese1: 这件衣服好看是好看，但是不适合我。
Translate1: This dress looks nice, but it doesn't suit me.

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de huánjìng hǎo shì hǎo ， dànshì jiāotōng bùtài fāngbiàn 。
Chinese1: 这里的环境好是好，但是交通不太方便。
Translate1: The environment here is good, but the traffic is not very convenient.

Pinyin1: nánshì nán ， dànshì wǒ xiāngxìn wǒnéng zuòdào 。
Chinese1: 难是难，但是我相信我能做到。
Translate1: It is difficult, but I believe I can do it.

Pinyin1: hàochī shì hàochī ， jiùshì bùtài jiànkāng 。
Chinese1: 好吃是好吃，就是不太健康。
Translate1: It's delicious, but not healthy.

Pinyin1: zhège dōngxi hǎo shì hǎo ， jiùshì tàiguì le 。
Chinese1: 这个东西好是好，就是太贵了。
Translate1: This thing is good, but it is too expensive.

Pinyin1: zhège xuésheng cōngming shì cōngming ， jiùshì bùtài nǔlì 。
Chinese1: 这个学生聪明是聪明，就是不太努力。
Translate1: This student is smart because he is smart, but he just doesn't work hard.

Pinyin1: tā nǚpéngyou piàoliang shì piàoliang ， jiùshì yǒudiǎn qíguài 。
Chinese1: 他女朋友漂亮是漂亮，就是有点奇怪。
Translate1: His girlfriend is beautiful because she is beautiful, but she is a little strange.

Pinyin1: èsǐ le ， wǒ yīxià kè jiùyào qù chī wǔfàn 。
Chinese1: 饿死了，我一下课就要去吃午饭。
Translate1: I'm starving and I'm going to have lunch after class.

Pinyin1: nǐ néng bùnéng yī xiàbān jiù qù jiē háizi ？
Chinese1: 你能不能一下班就去接孩子？
Translate1: Can you pick up the kids right after work?

Pinyin1: tā yīfāngmiàn xiǎng gǎibiàn ， yīfāngmiàn yòu hàipà gǎibiàn 。
Chinese1: 他一方面想改变，一方面又害怕改变。
Translate1: On the one hand, he wants to change, but on the other hand, he is afraid of change.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīfāngmiàn bùxiǎng zhèyàng zuò ， yīfāngmiàn bìxū zhèyàng zuò 。
Chinese1: 我们一方面不想这样做，一方面必须这样做。
Translate1: On the one hand, we do not want to do this, but on the other hand, we must.

Pinyin1: chōuyān yīfāngmiàn duì zìjǐ yǒuhài ， yīfāngmiàn duì shēnbiān de rén yě yǒuhài 。
Chinese1: 抽烟一方面对自己有害，一方面对身边的人也有害。
Translate1: On the one hand, smoking is harmful to yourself, and on the other hand, it is also harmful to those around you.

Pinyin1: yòng zhìnéngshǒujī yīfāngmiàn hěn fāngbiàn ， lìngyīfāngmiàn yě hěn róngyì làngfèishíjiān 。
Chinese1: 用智能手机一方面很方便，另一方面也很容易浪费时间。
Translate1: On the one hand, using a smartphone is very convenient, but on the other hand, it is easy to waste time.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīfāngmiàn yào ràng kèhù mǎnyì ， lìngyīfāngmiàn yě yào kòngzhì chéngběn 。
Chinese1: 我们一方面要让客户满意，另一方面也要控制成本。
Translate1: On the one hand, we want to satisfy our customers, and on the other hand, we also need to control costs.

Pinyin1: yīfāngmiàn tāmen de fúwù hěn zhuānyè ， lìngyīfāngmiàn tāmen de jiàgé yě hěn hélǐ 。
Chinese1: 一方面他们的服务很专业，另一方面他们的价格也很合理。
Translate1: On the one hand their service is very professional, on the other hand their prices are very reasonable.

Pinyin1: zhèyàng zuò yīfāngmiàn néng jiéshěngshíjiān ， yīfāngmiàn néng tígāozhìliàng 。
Chinese1: 这样做一方面能节省时间，一方面能提高质量。
Translate1: This saves time on the one hand and improves quality on the other.

Pinyin1: shēnghuó běnlái jiù hěn bù róngyì 。
Chinese1: 生活本来就很不容易。
Translate1: Life is not easy.

Pinyin1: bānjiā běnlái jiù hěn máfan 。
Chinese1: 搬家本来就很麻烦。
Translate1: Moving was already a hassle.
